FAQPage.title: FAQ | alecia
FAQPage.subtitle: Answers to frequently asked questions about sales, acquisitions, and our services.
FAQPage.heading: Frequently Asked Questions

q1.question: What services does Alecia offer?
q1.answer: Alecia is an M&A advisory firm offering a range of specialized services: divestitures, acquisitions, mergers, financing, and fundraising. We support our clients from strategic reflection to finalization, managing the entire operation and selecting the most relevant counterparties.

q2.question: How does Alecia differentiate itself from other financial advisors?
q2.answer: We adopt an entrepreneurial approach with an integrated team (lawyers, CPAs). We guarantee the involvement of two experienced partners on every mission, and our success fees are based on actual value to maintain a total alignment of interests.

q3.question: Do you specialize in a particular sector?
q3.answer: We are multi-sector based on our extensive experience: agrifood, distribution, B2B/B2C, industry, BTP, real estate, healthcare, technology, and environmental/social impact.

q4.question: How are your fees calculated?
q4.answer: Our remuneration includes initial retainer fees (strategic commitment costs) and success fees (percentage of the actual value). This model ensures that our interests are aligned with yours in the long term.

q5.question: What does Alecia mean?
q5.answer: Alecia draws its origin from the concept of 'Aletheia,' which embodies truth and reality. This name guides our approach based on honesty, rigor, integrity, excellence, and loyalty.

ExpertisesPage.description: Alecia supports SMEs, Mid-caps, and high-growth companies by anticipating their needs and providing tailored solutions.
ExpertisesPage.heading: Operational Excellence
ExpertisesPage.subtitle: A tailored approach for every stage of your company's lifecycle.

cession.title: Divestiture & Transmission
cession.description: Alecia supports you in securing the operation, defending your interests, and maximizing value. Our process relies on three pillars: Preparation (valuation and strategy), Identification of buyers (discreet targeting via our extensive network), and Negotiation until closing to protect your interests.

acquisition.title: Acquisition & External Growth
acquisition.description: We guide you through this complex process with a proven methodology. We intervene in Analysis and Evaluation (strategic compatibility), Negotiation and Structuring (optimizing conditions), and Post-Acquisition Integration to ensure expected synergies.

levee.title: Fundraising & Financing
levee.description: Innovation in financing strategies (equity, debt, hybrid). We manage a vast network of investors and institutions to address your growth, restructuring, or asset realization challenges, while negotiating favorable governance terms.

Footer.description: M&A Advisory for SMEs and Mid-Caps. Valuation 5 m€ - 50 m€.

Metadata.title: alecia | M&A Advisory for SMEs & Mid-caps
Metadata.description: Advisory in mergers and acquisitions (Divestiture, Acquisition, Fundraising) for companies valued from €5M to €50M. An approach of excellence, honesty, and commitment.

CookieBanner.title: Respect your privacy
CookieBanner.description: We use cookies to improve your experience, perform audience statistics and offer you adapted content. By clicking on "Accept all", you accept the deposit of third-party cookies.

LegalPage.title: Legal Notice
LegalPage.intro: In accordance with the provisions of Articles 6-III and 19 of Law No. 2004-575 of June 21, 2004 for Confidence in the Digital Economy, known as L.C.E.N., users and visitors of the alecia website are informed of this legal notice.

sections.title: 1. Site Editor
sections.content: The alecia website is published by the company ALECIA PARTNERS, with a capital of 10,000 euros, registered with the PARIS Trade and Companies Register under number 842 581 657, whose registered office is located at 12 avenue George V, 75008 Paris.

sections.title: 2. Publication Director
sections.content: The Publication Director is Christophe Berthon.

sections.title: 3. Hosting
sections.content: The website is hosted by the company GANDI, located at 63-65 boulevard Masséna, 75013 Paris, France.

PrivacyPage.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPage.intro: alecia is committed to ensuring that the collection and processing of your data comply with the GDPR and the Data Protection Act. Last update: June 17, 2024.

sections.title: 1. Data Controller
sections.content: ALECIA PARTNERS, with a capital of 10,000 euros, is responsible for the processing of data collected on the site.

sections.title: 2. Data Collection
sections.content: We collect data via our contact forms to respond to your requests (Divestiture, Acquisition, Contact). This data includes: name, email, telephone, and professional information related to the operation.

sections.title: 3. Your Rights
sections.content: You have the right to access, rectify, and delete your data. Contact dpo@alecia.com.

process.title: Our Methodology
process.subtitle: A proven 4-step process to secure and maximize the value of your transactions

step1.label: Step 1
step1.title: Diagnosis & Strategy
step1.description: In-depth analysis of your situation, objective definition, and development of a tailored strategy adapted to your challenges.

step2.label: Step 2
step2.title: Preparation & Valuation
step2.description: Optimization of value drivers, documentary preparation to the highest standards, and realistic and defensible valuation.

step3.label: Step 3
step3.title: Identification & Approach
step3.description: Precise targeting of relevant counterparties, discreet and professional approach, and management of the selection process.

step4.label: Step 4
step4.title: Negotiation & Closing
step4.description: Firm negotiation of conditions, coordination of due diligence, legal security, and support until final signature.
